html:
5.21.25  8:01 am   how many elephants

      at least all of them but maybe more

5.21.25  7:18 am   Are you a baby?

      in some ways yes

5.21.25  7:11 am   What to do when you don't want to do anything?

      think what WOULD i want to do if there was such a thing

5.21.25  7:00 am   I spend all my days and all my nights thinking about doing cool things, but never actually going through with those things. Do you have any advice for doing things?

      i've seen it over and over again, you need to be even more specific about what it is you were originally so excited to do

5.21.25  4:44 am   is Rick Astley's "Never gonna give you up" song his best one or did it only get popular by chance

      somewhere in the middle. some chance, also likely good

5.21.25  2:27 am   Do you believe curse words are beneficial to communication? 

      i don't believe it's beneficial to label certain words as 'curse'

5.21.25  2:02 am   Important question bruv, in "where i've been" one of the people says "do you think we should L.E.A.V.E?", what does L.E.A.V.E stand for?

      leisurely exit, and venture elsewhere

5.21.25  12:39 am   the ground plane built into blender. The matrix of wires behind a satellite dish being called the ground plane. I don't want you to spoil it, but how many other uses of ground plane are out there? There must be more

      of course. those are two fairly common words. they will get used together a lot

5.21.25  12:06 am   how long do you think it will take to read every question and ansnwer ever? please say not long im getting nervous just from thinking of it

      it might take a couple years

5.20.25  11:57 pm   have you ever flown a bird, or been flown by a bird?

      not that i recall

5.20.25  11:44 pm   What do you do when all of the things you're supposed to do and all the things you want to do pile up?
Is there really anything else other than just... Doing?
I've gotta know what you think. 

      write them all down, just to see what you're dealing with. then a reasonable idea will form, of what you might want to do here

5.20.25  11:09 pm   I am trying to think of every character in your videos (besides the history ones) that has a name, but I can only recall Steve. 

      how about hans trivioli

5.20.25  10:41 pm   Were nukes a good idea in hindsight?

      heck, was mortality even a good idea

5.20.25  9:39 pm   do you sympathize with the person in the barren wasteland or are you on the side of the rabbit

      i've tried to sympathize with everyone, but i've been informed that is frowned upon

5.20.25  8:40 pm   am i a stranger to falling in love?

      there's a halloween costume of that

5.20.25  8:18 pm   what do you think of humanity

      pretty cool

5.20.25  6:52 pm   how much does the beach cost?

      it's free, but it's bring your own sand

5.20.25  6:40 pm   If you had to pitch an idea for a new subway route to the MTA, what would it be?

      how about extending the R over the verrazzano to old town

5.20.25  5:34 pm   I had a dream about someone and how we didn't talk anymore, so I started writing a song about that, but then that same day I met that person on public transport and we had a long chat. Would it be bad luck to finish the song? 

      maybe you can start the song the way you were writing it, but then put an exciting twist in the song where you actually do meet the person

5.20.25  5:28 pm   How would you say your musical style has evolved since you started releasing songs?

      from my perspective it feels the same. i'm still the same person trying to solve the same problems. i haven't solved them yet but don't worry i will soon

5.20.25  4:07 pm   Why is the top of this page titled "ueqstions"? 

      it's not ueqstions, it's ueqstions. and it means 'questions', and it's stylized for the title heading. kind of like you see fancy signs on buildings, except here i've done it within a specific ruleset which is no fonts no pictures. only letters and color choices. the same game for all the other pages of this site

5.20.25  3:14 pm   do you ever cry sometimes

      heck, sometimes i cry all the time

5.20.25  2:00 pm   are you funny

      if necessary

5.20.25  1:47 pm   Who is your least favorite person?

      i haven't really thought about that

5.20.25  1:45 pm   In the video titled 'Perfect" one of the characters says he has learned how to do everything except go up. However, in said seen, he was on top of the commercial signage fixture, which he had to go up to get onto. Why is this?

      maybe that doesn't count because it wasn't very far

5.20.25  12:22 pm   Would you like some pizza on your pineapple, Mr Wurtz?

      can you bake the pizza inside of the pineapple

5.20.25  12:01 pm   I've just realized something incredible. The thumbnail for the Wild Frolicking Adventures of Informational Education video says "wfaoie.fcp". Does FCP, by any chance, stand for the band "fox capture plan?"

      no, it stands for "this program was discontinued in 2011 but no one will ever believe me because they replaced it with a different program and gave that one the same name as a prank"

5.20.25  11:39 am   I keep eating cheese in my sleep. I am lactose intolerant. How do i stop this?

      you'll have to make the cheese more difficult to access

5.20.25  11:14 am   I'm looking for the post office but I think I took a wrong turn somewhere, this clearly isn't it. Could you give me directions?

      it's probably on main street

5.20.25  10:23 am   is it hard to creatively live up to your masterpieces?

      nothing i've done has ever creatively lived up to what it could have been

5.20.25  10:16 am   how cool are rockets

      50%

5.20.25  10:15 am   Thoughts on cats? 

      incredibly good at whack a mole

5.20.25  10:07 am   do you like adobe animate

      fortunately because i am not subscribed i am not currently required to like it

5.20.25  9:03 am   am i really you dreaming i'm me

      let me perform some calculations, no, you are not

5.20.25  6:10 am   Do you listen to music other than yours when working on music?

      no

5.20.25  5:55 am   how do i stop myself from visualizing painful things 

      make a checklist of things you'd rather visualize. for a little game to play, put them in a certain order and then try to memorize the order

5.20.25  2:58 am   do you have any ideas of what you'd do for staging and choreography if you ever do a live show? would you prefer an elaborate setup, or something very simple with just you and a band?

      i have a strict no pre-recording rule. another rule i tentatively have is no drum mics. this basically necessitates a small venue. and a 3rd rule, also tentative, is that every show is in the same venue

5.20.25  2:49 am   Do you think all religions are just different interpretations of the same otherworldly power or powers?

      somewhere deep down they are all trying to get at the same thing. and they are all equally prone to corruption

5.20.25  2:05 am   is there a law of conservation of violence?

      it's called revenge, but it's not strictly a law

5.20.25  1:22 am   I'm convinced that an evil gnome keeps ripping my shirts when i'm not looking. How do i drive him away?

      become convinced that it is gone

5.20.25  12:20 am   how do you find love?

      how about looking in the darndest places

5.19.25  11:23 pm   Who would win in a fight, one rabbit or one table? If there table had a chair for an ally would the chair be able to take out the rabbit even if the rabbit ate a carrot?

      i'm not sure you could convince a rabbit or a table to fight each other

5.19.25  10:38 pm   Thoughts on the world right now?

      i'm sure it's fine. it technically always is

5.19.25  9:46 pm   What happens if you go South from the South Pole? 

      you can't. from the south pole every direction is north

5.19.25  9:12 pm   How do you start

      WHAT do you start

5.19.25  8:59 pm   Why do we call stuff old news?
It's kind of an oxymoron. 

      precisely the problem it aims to express. when something presented as news is not so new

5.19.25  8:53 pm   how are u? 

      pretty good

5.19.25  8:02 pm   Do people ever send you suicide notes through here?

      i've quite commonly seen contemplation, but i don't recall seeing anything that sounded final. perhaps the idea of a 'questions page' makes them want to put it in the form of a question about whether or not they should do it. which at least gives me a chance to try to weigh in

5.19.25  7:59 pm   hi when I was like 12 (very long time ago) I would go on here and ask you the dumbest corniest questions and i'd just like to apologize for those dumb questions.  I don't really remember all of them specifically but I remember one of them was telling you I drew you as a cat and that must've been awfully off-putting to read.  alas I was a wee child and my frontal lobe was less developed.  do you accept my apology

      yes i do

5.19.25  7:51 pm   woke up on the wrong side of bed. how do u normally make urself feel better when this happens?? asking for a friend

      you have to go to sleep and wake up again
